item.title: Ultra leiningen plugin
item.description: There is nice leiningen plugin named “Ultra” which can significantly improve your clojure’s repl interaction. Main features: 1. colorized output of data structures (using solarized theme) 2. clear test output 3. better stacktraces 4. java object introspection.
